Summary In a nutshell: driver for innovation, focus on growth and on starting new business fields, problem solver, generator and implementer of new ideas * business engineer, technical business development, product manager * strong experience in international business, fluent in 5 languages * active, dynamic, focused on the outcome. 
 
Specialties:  
- Identifying gaps and patterns 
- Identifying new business fields and implementing solutions for them 
- Innovative solution-finder with an eye for improving the status-quo 
- Strong at building network and finding short-cuts 
 
In my whole career I have been active in innovative areas and in starting up new business fields and make them roll. In these activities I had the role of business / people / project / product manager. The projects I lead were in software development, software services and cross-organization projects. 
 
Active as an entrepreneur supporting the entrepreneur community in Copenhagen, Hamburg and Stralsund. 
 
I have been employed at IBM USA, Germany and Denmark and Mercedes Benz Research and I have worked with teams world-wide: EU, USA, Japan, South Africa, Australia etc. thus I have had a lot of exposure to cultural differences.  
 
In 2006, I founded Worktrotter which has over 9.000 members. I have written and published the books 
- "DOs and DON'Ts in Danish workplace culture" a handbook that gives a deep-dive into Danish workplaces, how to find work in Denmark and how to be successful when working with Danes.  
- "The Worktrotter's Guide to Denmark" a practical handbook that gives step-by-step instructions to enable newcomers to "roll" from the first day.
